title: Dogecoin Price Prediction 2023-2032: DOGE to the Moon?
description: Here are top Dogecoin predictions and price trends from the Cryptopolitan team. Review its background and long-term commentary.

title: Crypto influencer on TikTok pleads guilty to $1.2 million fraud
description: A former TikTok crypto influencer has been forced to forfeit a gold physical bitcoin and more than $17,000 in cash after pleading guilty to wire fraud

title: Peter Schiff’s Twitter account reportedly hacked to promote crypto scam
description: The verified Twitter account belonging to media personality and Euro Pacific Capital CEO Peter Schiff may have been hacked to shill the supposed launch of a new cryptocurrency

title: Unveiling Government’s Anti-Bitcoin Strategy: Insights From Simply Bitcoin
description:
YouTube channel Simply Bitcoin recently posted a YouTube video with guest Dr. Albert Ngi, who is the Optemerist to accept crypto payments including Bitcoin. The video further delved into the Government’s new strategy to “Stop Bitcoin Adoption,” as the title suggests. In the beginning, the show host announces that the Bitcoin price stood at $27,065 […]

The post Unveiling Government’s Anti-Bitcoin Strategy: Insights From Simply Bitcoin appeared first on Coin Edition.
